definitions.text: hard close-grained wood of any of various birch trees; used especially in furniture and interior finishes and plywood
any betulaceous tree or shrub of the genus Betula having a thin peeling bark
a switch consisting of a twig or a bundle of twigs from a birch tree; used to hit people as punishment
examples: my father never spared the birch

definitions.text: consisting of or made of wood of the birch tree
